issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I tried to run a (attached) template through cloudformation via SWF, an exception was thrown in the activity (which is a standard use case).  It appears the exception may have had an object graph within it, causing the exception to fail to be serialized with the standard Jackson deserializer.

Workflow status unknown as :

aws swf --endpoint http://10.111.1.61:8773/services/SimpleWorkflow --region us-east1 get-workflow-execution-history --domain CloudFormationDomain --execution workflowId=14d8ebe0-3a7f-4e0b-9aa4-3dbcb385d01b,runId=5adb919b-00c1-4d23-b9be-592379d4d8e5

A client error (UnknownResourceFault) occurred when calling the GetWorkflowExecutionHistory operation: Unknown execution, runId = 5adb919b-00c1-4d23-b9be-592379d4d8e5

Note: The exception is due to the NetworkInterface being unable to get a network address, this is a known issue in non-edge mode, and not the subject of this bug.

In addition, a request to the SWF service after the error resulted in a 403 Forbidden error, whose response is in XML and the simple workflow client can not parse the result, due to a JSON expected response.
fields.summary: SWF data deserialization fails on an error for CloudFormation

comments.body: I can work around this by throwing an exception with a smaller footprint for now.
This issue cannot be directly verified so create/delete stack should be tested to ensure there are no regressions.
Attached log files from verification attempt.

[~hspencer], the related SWF workflows for a stack are owned by the cloudformation system account rather than the account that owns the stack. By default the SWF service is only enabled for system / administrator use as it is a tech preview in 4.1 (see the [services.]simpleworkflow.systemonly cloud property)

[~sjones],

AH-HAH! Ok, will test again.  Thanks for that info.

[~sjones],

Ah ok.  I didn't see this on the Edge cloud setup.  The stack fails to deploy (which is expected), but the error you described doesn't come up.  I am guessing this can be labeled as fixed then?

[~sjones],

I checked the DB for the workflow ID and the run ID.  I saw the following:
{code}
eucalyptus_shared=# select stack_id,workflow_id,run_id from stack_workflows;
                                             stack_id                                              |             workflow_id              |                run_id
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------+--------------------------------------
 arn:aws:cloudformation::203845665981:stack/VPCStackEUCA10020/7522ddf7-662a-434e-9bcf-e3f8a2790ac6 | 8103a2ca-0f20-487f-9929-8b4012e83011 | b692aa1b-be15-47f9-a090-3bd6832b9bc2
 arn:aws:cloudformation::203845665981:stack/VPCStackEUCA10020/7522ddf7-662a-434e-9bcf-e3f8a2790ac6 | acbcb50f-4dc9-4e53-adcf-979f3218d98f | 1f6f4587-1ddd-4dc0-bcff-d27126839fc2
 arn:aws:cloudformation::203845665981:stack/VPCStackEUCA10020/7522ddf7-662a-434e-9bcf-e3f8a2790ac6 | 8b6e5477-db91-4f4c-bba0-58169a2fc2ce | afeec6d0-d4cc-4ebb-93b7-9b8aedbd4d6b
 arn:aws:cloudformation::203845665981:stack/VPCStackEUCA10020/a360b078-2d12-4c5e-b542-ce3ff1f61736 | 54cf54ba-e5bd-485d-b044-654ba0c948a2 | ecb33164-77f2-488d-a207-6e60b659bd47
 arn:aws:cloudformation::203845665981:stack/VPCStackEUCA10020/a360b078-2d12-4c5e-b542-ce3ff1f61736 | 85721f07-30f4-4bb0-bc8c-e5fda5486b3c | ff0d8615-0951-4881-9565-1d11e6c31a46
(5 rows)
{code}
However, when I try to get the workflow execution history for any of those entries, I see the following:
{code}
# aws --endpoint-url http://simpleworkflow.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ swf get-workflow-execution-history --domain CloudFormation --execution workflowId=54cf54ba-e5bd-485d-b044-654ba0c948a2,runId=ecb33164-77f2-488d-a207-6e60b659bd47 --profile admin-group1

A client error (UnknownResourceFault) occurred when calling the GetWorkflowExecutionHistory operation: Unknown execution, runId = ecb33164-77f2-488d-a207-6e60b659bd47
{code}
Am I missing something here? 

Regarding the issue, this seems to be resolved.  The StackOverflowError did not show up in the logs; therefore I will mark this as fixed.
StackOverflowError does not show up in the logs anymore, therefore issue is resolved.
[~hspencer], the domain is CloudFormationDomain, not CloudFormation.

[~sjones],

Ah, I missed that.  I changed the domain, and still received the error:
{code}
## From the DB ###
                                             stack_id                                              |             workflow_id              |                run_id                |         workflow_type
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------+--------------------------------------+-------------------------------
arn:aws:cloudformation::203845665981:stack/VPCStackEUCA10020/a360b078-2d12-4c5e-b542-ce3ff1f61736 | 85721f07-30f4-4bb0-bc8c-e5fda5486b3c | ff0d8615-0951-4881-9565-1d11e6c31a46 | MONITOR_CREATE_STACK_WORKFLOW
{code}
{code}
# aws --endpoint-url http://simpleworkflow.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ swf get-workflow-execution-history --domain CloudFormationDomain --execution workflowId=85721f07-30f4-4bb0-bc8c-e5fda5486b3c,runId=ff0d8615-0951-4881-9565-1d11e6c31a46 --profile admin-group1

A client error (UnknownResourceFault) occurred when calling the GetWorkflowExecutionHistory operation: Unknown execution, runId = ff0d8615-0951-4881-9565-1d11e6c31a46
{code}

I thought it was a credential issue, but I checked against the EC2 service, and everything worked out fine:
{code}
# aws --endpoint-url http://compute.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ ec2 describe-availability-zones --zone-names verbose --profile admin-group1
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	10.111.5.13 arn:euca:eucalyptus:one:cluster:CC_13/	one
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	free / max   cpu   ram  disk	|- vm types
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0005 / 0016   1    256     5	|- m1.small

AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0005 / 0016   1    512    10	|- m1.medium

AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0000 / 0004   4   4096    30	|- m3.2xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0000 / 0002   8   3072    60	|- cc1.4xlarge

AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0000 / 0000   8   6144   120	|- hi1.4xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0000 / 0000  16   6144   120	|- cc2.8xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0000 / 0000  16   12288   200	|- cg1.4xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0000 / 0000  16   16384   240	|- cr1.8xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0000 / 0000  48   119808  24000	|- hs1.8xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	10.111.5.23 arn:euca:eucalyptus:two:cluster:CC_23/	two
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	free / max   cpu   ram  disk	|- vm types
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0005 / 0016   1    256     5	|- m1.small
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0005 / 0016   1    256     5	|- t1.micro
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0005 / 0016   1    512    10	|- m1.medium
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0002 / 0008   2    512    10	|- c1.medium
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0002 / 0008   2    512    10	|- m1.large
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0002 / 0008   2   1024    10	|- m1.xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0002 / 0008   2   2048    10	|- c1.xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0002 / 0008   2   2048    10	|- m2.xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0001 / 0004   4   2048    15	|- m3.xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0002 / 0006   2   2048    30	|- m2.2xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0001 / 0004   4   4096    30	|- m3.2xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0000 / 0002   8   3072    60	|- cc1.4xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0000 / 0002   8   4096    60	|- m2.4xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0000 / 0000   8   6144   120	|- hi1.4xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0000 / 0000  16   6144   120	|- cc2.8xlarge
AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0000 / 0000  16   12288   200	|- cg1.4xlarge

AVAILABILITYZONES	None	0000 / 0000  48   119808  24000	|- hs1.8xlarge
{code}

Should it matter from what machine I am making the calls from (I don't think it would, but just double-checking)?
[~hspencer], you would need to make the request as the cloudformation service and use a valid domain/execution.

[~sjones],

BAM!  That was it.  I was using the admin user of the 'eucalyptus' account, not the admin user of the '(eucalyptus)cloudformation' account.  It worked like a charm after I did that.  

{code}
# aws --endpoint-url http://simpleworkflow.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ swf get-workflow-execution-history --domain CloudFormationDomain --execution workflowId=85721f07-30f4-4bb0-bc8c-e5fda5486b3c,runId=ff0d8615-0951-4881-9565-1d11e6c31a46 --profile cloudformation-group1

WORKFLOWEXECUTIONSTARTEDEVENTATTRIBUTES	TERMINATE	10800	["[Ljava.lang.Object;",["arn:aws:cloudformation::203845665981:stack/VPCStackEUCA10020/a360b078-2d12-4c5e-b542-ce3ff1f61736","203845665981","{\"nodes\":\"[\\\"VPC\\\",\\\"InternetGateway\\\",\\\"Subnet\\\",\\\"AttachGateway\\\",\\\"IPAddress\\\",\\\"RouteTable\\\",\\\"Route\\\",\\\"NetworkAcl\\\",\\\"NetworkAclEntry\\\",\\\"DhcpOptions\\\",\\\"SubnetNetworkAclAssociation\\\",\\\"SubnetRouteTableAssociation\\\",\\\"VPCDHCPOptionsAssociation\\\",\\\"SecurityGroup\\\",\\\"NetworkInterface\\\"]\",\"dependencies\":\"{\\\"AttachGateway\\\":[\\\"IPAddress\\\"],\\\"DhcpOptions\\\":[\\\"VPCDHCPOptionsAssociation\\\"],\\\"InternetGateway\\\":[\\\"AttachGateway\\\",\\\"Route\\\"],\\\"NetworkAcl\\\":[\\\"NetworkAclEntry\\\",\\\"SubnetNetworkAclAssociation\\\"],\\\"RouteTable\\\":[\\\"Route\\\",\\\"SubnetRouteTableAssociation\\\"],\\\"SecurityGroup\\\":[\\\"NetworkInterface\\\"],\\\"Subnet\\\":[\\\"NetworkInterface\\\",\\\"SubnetNetworkAclAssociation\\\",\\\"SubnetRouteTableAssociation\\\"],\\\"VPC\\\":[\\\"AttachGateway\\\",\\\"NetworkAcl\\\",\\\"RouteTable\\\",\\\"SecurityGroup\\\",\\\"Subnet\\\",\\\"VPCDHCPOptionsAssociation\\\"]}\"}","AIDDPPQQHFSVNF48HN7GA","ROLLBACK"]]	0	30
